tit.e: Mt. Miminashi (a mountain in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture)
Mt. Miminashi (a mountain in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 耳成山（みみなしやま）は、奈良県橿原市にある山。
sen.e: Mt. Miminashi (Miminashi-yama) is a mountain in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.
Mt. Miminashi is a mountain in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.
Mt. Miminashi is a mountain in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 近鉄大阪線耳成駅下車。
sen.e: Get off at Miminashi station of Kintetsu Osaka Line.
Get off at Miminashi Station of Kintetsu Osaka Line.
Get off at Miminashi Station of Kintetsu Osaka Line.

sen.j: 南部に耳成山公園が整備され、桜の名所となっている。
sen.e: Miminashiyama Park is placed to the south of Mt. Miminashi, and it is known as a cherry blossom viewing spot.
Miminashiyama Park is placed to the south of Mt. Miminashi, and it is known as a cherry blossom viewing spot.
Miminashiyama Park is placed to the south of Mt. Miminashi, and it is known as a cherry blossom viewing spot.

sen.j: 大和三山の一つで、もっとも北に位置する。
sen.e: It is one of the three Mountains of Yamato, and is the northernmost mountain among them.
It is one of the three Mountains of Yamato, and is the northernmost mountain among them.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: It is one of the three Mountains of Yamato, and is the northernmost mountain among them.

sen.j: この山は第三紀に噴出した火山岩が侵食されてその一部のみが残存した侵食地形である。
sen.e: This mountain is an erosion landform, a part of a volcanic rock, which had been eructated in the third century, remained after erosion.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: This mountain is an erosion landform, a part of a volcanic rock, which had been eructated in Tertiary period, remained after erosion.
This mountain is an erosion landform, a part of a volcanic rock, which had been eructated in Tertiary period, remained after erosion.

sen.j: これ自体が火山ではない。
sen.e: Therefore, it is not a volcano itself.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Therefore, it is not a volcano itself.
Therefore, it is not a volcano itself.

sen.j: 登山途中、木々の合間から眺望が出来る箇所がいくつかあり同じく大和三山である畝傍山を傍観できる箇所もある。
sen.e: During the way to the mountaintop, a few spots have a view through trees, while there are spots where Mount Unebi, one of the three Mountains of Yamamto, can be viewed.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: During the way to the mountaintop, a few spots have a view through trees, while there are spots where Mt. Unebi, one of the three Mountains of Yamato, can be viewed.
During the way to the mountaintop, a few spots have a view through trees, while there are spots where Mt. Unebi, one of the three Mountains of Yamato, can be viewed.

sen.j: だが、山頂は特別な整備はされていないので眺望は全くない。
sen.e: However, on the mountaintop, there is no spot for a view as it is not specially maintained.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: However, on the mountaintop, there is no spot for a view as it is not specially maintained.
However, on the mountaintop, there is no spot for a view as it is not specially maintained.

sen.j: 山頂よりやや低い所に耳成山口神社がある。
sen.e: Miminashiyamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the place which is a little lower than the mountaintop of Mt. Miminashi.
Miminashi Yamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the place which is a little lower than the mountaintop of Mt. Miminashi.
Miminashi Yamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the place which is a little lower than the mountaintop of Mt. Miminashi.

sen.j: 近鉄大阪線の大和八木駅～耳成駅間の車中からは、そのほぼ完全な三角形の耳成山を眺めることができる。
sen.e: From the train of Kintetsu Osaka Line running between Yamato-Yagi Station and Miminashi Station, an almost perfectly triangle shaped Mt. Miminashi can be viewed.
From the train of Kintetsu Osaka Line running between Yamato-Yagi Station and Miminashi Station, an almost perfectly triangle shaped Mt. Miminashi can be viewed.
From the train of Kintetsu Osaka Line running between Yamato-Yagi Station and Miminashi Station, an almost perfectly triangle shaped Mt. Miminashi can be viewed.

sen.j: 上円下方墳、古代大君の御陵と伝わる。
sen.e: It is a tomb with a dome-shaped mound on a square base, and it is said to be the Misasagi (Imperial mausoleum) of Okimi in ancient times.
It is a tumulus with a dome-shaped mound on a square base, and it is said to be the Misasagi (Imperial mausoleum) of Okimi in ancient times.
It is a tumulus with a dome-shaped mound on a square base, and it is said to be the Misasagi (Imperial mausoleum) of Okimi in ancient times.

sen.j: 山頂付近下部に山口神社が在る。
sen.e: Yamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the lower part of the area in the vicinity of the mountaintop.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Yamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the lower part of the area in the vicinity of the mountaintop.
Yamaguchi-jinja Shrine is located in the lower part of the area in the vicinity of the mountaintop.

sen.j: また、山頂には明治天皇大演習御征監地と記された石柱がある。
sen.e: On the mountaintop, there is a stone pillar which has an inscription; the place where Meiji Emperor visited for and supervised an army exercise.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: On the mountaintop, there is a stone pillar which has an inscription; the place where Emperor Meiji visited for and supervised an army exercise.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除し、用語を変更しました。
sen.e: On the mountaintop, there is a stone pillar which has an inscription; the place where Emperor Meiji visited for and supervised an army exercise.
